name: Eventizer
tagline: A simple wordpress plugin to help you manage your events
body:
Eventizer API
===============

Custom Hooks:

* eventizer_init
* eventizer_render
* eventizer_save

Custom Filter:

* ev\_setting\_tabs

Functions:

* add\_event\_options
* get\_event\_options
* update\_event\_options
* delete\_event\_options

#

* add\_mail
* update\_mail
* delete\_mail
* get\_all\_mails
* get\_mail
* get\_mail\_by\_context

Helpers:

* label
* hidden
* text
* textarea
* radio
* checkbox
* dropdown
* button
* datepicker
* timepicker
* geoinput
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
